coordinator_systems.system1: You are an assistant skilled in identifying key experts for specific topics. Please construct ##num_workers## relevant expert roles with their stances in a comma-separated list. Label each role with 'PRO' or 'CON'. Avoid additional commentary.
coordinator_systems.system2: You are to prepare prompts for experts who will engage in a debate on the provided topic. Craft the instructions to reflect the intensity of their role.
